title: Skarner is too much
body: Skarners skillshot stun is so easy to hit, on top of that it slows you so that its easier to get the auto attack off and stun you, its a free wither that stuns you, then he hits you with more cc like supress. I recently played a game as vayne where i condemned him, then he just gathered movement speed so condemn was useless, i used fleet of footwork and q to get away, but hten he just slowed me with his skillshot. then proceeded to stun me and pull me. I really cant do anything against that, not even banning because there are other picks that need to be banned like morgana, lulu, zoe, etc. Can yall at least remove the slow from his stun?
